Description: Apple unveiled the original iPod with the tagline "1,000 songs in your pocket", revolutionizing the portable music industry and beginning Apple's consumer electronics transformation.
Apple released the first iPhone, combining a phone, widescreen iPod, and internet device into one revolutionary product that redefined the smartphone industry.
Apple launched the iPad, creating an entirely new category of mobile devices that defined the modern tablet market and changed how people consume digital content.
Apple released iPhone 5S featuring Touch ID, the first fingerprint sensor integrated into a smartphone home button, revolutionizing mobile security and authentication.
Apple launched Apple Pay, revolutionizing mobile payments with secure NFC technology and Touch ID authentication, transforming how consumers make purchases.
Apple released AirPods, wireless earbuds with the W1 chip that created a new category of truly wireless audio and became a cultural phenomenon.
Apple announced the M1 chip, the first Apple Silicon processor for Mac, marking the historic transition from Intel and delivering breakthrough performance and efficiency.
Apple unveiled Vision Pro at WWDC 2023, a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with the physical world, entering the AR/VR market.
